name: Tomato Timer
clickOneBlockFirst: Please click on a content block first
setDateTitle: Please set a time for the following block
schedule: schedule: Set a reminder date for the current content block
addBookmark: addBookmark: Set a reading point: Set the current content block as a bookmark, and delete other bookmarks in the current document
removeBrokenCards: removeBrokenCards: Clear all invalid flashcards. (Note: Do not use if you are rebuilding the index, wait until after rebuilding to avoid accidentally deleting valid flashcards.) (Invalid: The content block corresponding to the flashcard is deleted)
addFlashCard: addFlashCard: Add a list flashcard (for outlines/lists, set the entire list as a flashcard, not the current list item where the cursor is located)
deleteBlocks: deleteBlocks: Batch delete a large number of consecutive content blocks
moveBlocks: moveBlocks: Batch move a large number of consecutive content blocks
copyBlocks: copyBlocks: Batch copy a large number of consecutive content blocks
deleteBlocksHelp:
Batch delete help:

Please wrap the content to be processed with aadd1 and aacc2 lines respectively.

aacc1
It's a nice day today 1!
It's a nice day today 2!
...
It's a nice day today 3!
aacc2
moveBlocksHelp:
Batch move and copy help:

Please wrap the content to be processed with aadd1 and aacc2 lines respectively. Then insert a line aacc3 at the target location.

[Document 1]
aacc1
It's a nice day today 1!
It's a nice day today 2!
...
It's a nice day today 3!
aacc2
[Document 2]
...
aacc3
...
(Document 1 and Document 2 can be the same document)
